integration.description: Details about the integration used for processing the invoice.

domain.description: The domain or context to which the invoice belongs.

amount.description: The total amount of the invoice.

currency.description: The currency in which the invoice is denominated.

due_date.description: Deadline by which the invoice should be paid.

has_invoice.description: Flag indicating whether the invoice exists.

invoice_number.description: Unique number assigned to the invoice.

description.description: Brief description or purpose of the invoice.

pdf_url.description: URL to access the PDF version of the invoice.

line_items.description: List of individual products or services included in the invoice.

name.description: Name or description of the product or service.

amount.description: The amount charged for the specific line item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product or service included.

tax.description: Details about the taxes applied to the invoice.

name.description: Name or type of tax applied.

request_code.description: Code or identifier associated with the invoice request.

paid.description: Flag indicating whether the invoice has been paid.

paid_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the invoice was paid.

metadata.description: Additional information or metadata associated with the invoice.

notifications.description: Details about notifications sent regarding the invoice.

sent_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the notification was sent.

channel.description: The communication channel used for sending notifications.

offline_reference.description: Reference number or identifier for offline payments.

customer.description: Details about the customer associated with the invoice.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the invoice was created.
